content: cochet a corner to corner c2c moss stitch scarf the c2c moss stitch also known as the linen stitch is the perfect stitch for any yarn it works fantastically with variegated yarn self striping yarns or solid colours hook size s use one hook size larger than to your yarn recommends for my personal scarf i used 4 balls of stylecraft merry go round chunky in the shade pastel rainbow with a 6mm hook
